00043   String extract_page(char *request) {
00044     String retstr;
00045     const char *base, *ptr;
00046     if (!strncmp(request, "GET ", 4)) {
00047       base = request + 4;
00048       if ((ptr = strchr(base, ' ')) != 0)
00049         retstr = String(base, ptr-base);
00050       else
00051         retstr = base;
00052     }
00053     else
00054       retstr = "-";
00055     return retstr;
00056   }
00057 
00063   String format_timestamp(struct tm tm) {
00064     return format("%d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d:%02d", tm.tm_year+1900, tm.tm_mon+1, tm.tm_mday, tm.tm_hour, tm.tm_min, tm.tm_sec);
00065   }
00066 
00070   void report_error(Exception &e) {
00071     cerr << "error: "
00072          << Error::get_text(e.code())
00073          << " - " << e.what() << endl;
00074   }
00075 
00079   void handle_mutation_failure(TableMutatorPtr &mutator_ptr) {
00080     std::vector<std::pair<Cell, int> > failed_mutations;
00081 
00082     mutator_ptr->get_failed(failed_mutations);
00083     if (!failed_mutations.empty()) {
00084       for (size_t i=0; i<failed_mutations.size(); i++) {
00085         cerr << "Failed: (" << failed_mutations[i].first.row_key << "," 
00086              << failed_mutations[i].first.column_family;
00087         if (failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier)
00088           cerr << ":" << failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier;
00089         cerr << "," << failed_mutations[i].first.timestamp << ") - "
00090              << Error::get_text(failed_mutations[i].second) << endl;
00091       }
00092     }
00093   }

00095   const char *usage = 
00096     "\n"
00097     "  usage: apache_log_load [--time-order] <file>\n"
00098     "\n"
00099     "  Loads the Apache web log <file> into the LogDb\n"
00100     "  table.  By default, the row key is constructed\n"
00101     "  as:\n"
00102     "\n"
00103     "  <page> <timestamp>\n"
00104     "\n"
00105     "  This format facilitates queries that return\n"
00106     "  the click history for a specific page.  If\n"
00107     "  the --time-order switch is supplied, then\n"
00108     "  the row key is constructed as:\n"
00109     "\n"
00110     "  <timestamp> <page>\n"
00111     "\n"
00112     "  This format facilitates queries that return\n"
00113     "  a historical portion of the log.\n";
00114 
00115   const int RETRY_TIMEOUT = 30;
00116 
00117 }

00144 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00145   ApacheLogParser parser;
00146   ApacheLogEntry entry;
00147   ClientPtr client_ptr;
00148   TablePtr table_ptr;
00149   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00150   KeySpec key;
00151   const char *inputfile;
00152   bool time_order = false;
00153   String row;
00154 
00155   if (argc == 2)
00156     inputfile = argv[1];
00157   else if (argc == 3 && !strcmp(argv[1], "--time-order")) {
00158     time_order = true;
00159     inputfile = argv[2];
00160   }
00161   else {
00162     cout << usage << endl;
00163     return 0;
00164   }
00165 
00166   try {
00167 
00168     // Create Hypertable client object
00169     client_ptr = new Client( System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]) );
00170 
00171     // Open the 'LogDb' table
00172     table_ptr = client_ptr->open_table("LogDb");
00173 
00174     // Create a mutator object on the
00175     // 'LogDb' table
00176     mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00177 
00178   }
00179   catch (Exception &e) {
00180     report_error(e);
00181     return 1;
00182   }
00183 
00184   memset(&key, 0, sizeof(key));
00185 
00186   // Load the log file into the ApacheLogParser
00187   // object
00188   parser.load(inputfile);
00189 
00190   // The parser next method will return true
00191   // until EOF
00192   while (parser.next(entry)) {
00193 
00194     // Assemble the row key
00195     if (time_order) {
00196       row = format_timestamp(entry.tm);
00197       row += " ";
00198       row += extract_page(entry.request);
00199     }
00200     else {
00201       row = extract_page(entry.request);
00202       row += " ";
00203       row += format_timestamp(entry.tm);
00204     }
00205 
00206     key.row = row.c_str();
00207     key.row_len = row.length();
00208 
00209     try {
00210       key.column_family = "ClientIpAddress";
00211       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.ip_address);
00212       key.column_family = "UserId";
00213       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.userid);
00214       key.column_family = "Request";
00215       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.request);
00216       key.column_family = "ResponseCode";
00217       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.response_code);
00218       key.column_family = "ObjectSize";
00219       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.object_size);
00220       key.column_family = "Referer";
00221       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.referer);
00222       key.column_family = "UserAgent";
00223       mutator_ptr->set(key, entry.user_agent);
00224     }
00225     catch (Exception &e) {
00226       cerr << "Exception caught: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << " - " << e.what() << endl;
00227       do {
00228         if (!mutator_ptr->need_retry())
00229           _exit(1);
00230         handle_mutation_failure(mutator_ptr);
00231       } while (!mutator_ptr->retry(RETRY_TIMEOUT));
00232     }
00233   }
00234 
00235   // Flush pending updates
00236   try {
00237     mutator_ptr->flush();
00238   }
00239   catch (Exception &e) {
00240     cerr << "Exception caught: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << endl;
00241     do {
00242       if (!mutator_ptr->need_retry())
00243         _exit(1);
00244       handle_mutation_failure(mutator_ptr);
00245     } while (!mutator_ptr->retry(RETRY_TIMEOUT));
00246   }
00247 
00248   return 0;
00249 }
